organizations: Saunders Trades and Technical High School (Yonkers, NY)
lead_paragraph: Anthony Nicodemo, a gay high school basketball coach in Yonkers, said his players’ positive reaction to Jason Collins’s revelation had prompted his own.
snippet: Anthony Nicodemo, a gay high school basketball coach in Yonkers, said his players’ positive reaction to Jason Collins’s revelation had prompted his own.
